passage.translate: проход, прохождение, пассаж, проезд, пересекать, совершать переезд
examples: My office is just along the passage.
The police forced a passage through the crowd.
He read out a short passage from the Bible.
Please translate this passage into good English.
We walked down a narrow passage to the back of the building.
I heard him bawling at Gregory in the passage.

A depressing passage has prefaced every new page I have turned in life.

the passage from life to death
Bernice looked with dread at the end of the passage.
The men passaged right, or left, as it may be necessary.
The vagina is elastic enough to allow the passage of a fetus.

The restrictions on the passage of goods through the Suez Canal to Israel ports.
We groped along the dark passage.
The simple passage of time was enough.

The poem is a reflection on the passage of time.
He was guaranteed safe passage out of the country.

This passage must be played andante.

переход от жизни к смерти
